description:
Cocoa and Swift make a great team for building apps. Cocoa is the framework in
which Mac OS X itself is written, and Swift is the new language that makes
working with Cocoa classes and APIs easier than ever before. Here Todd Perkins
walks you through the steps to creating Mac applications with this powerhouse
combo. He'll take you through the basic concepts behind Cocoa, Swift, and the
development environment known as Xcode, and then go straight into development.
Learn how to create interface elements and connect them to code, work with
bindings and key-value coding, and debug your applications and submit them to
the Apple Store.
title: Cocoa with Swift Essential Training
